name: Balloon Bot
description:
The factory you work at has lost power, but the show must go on! Your boss tied balloons to the robot arm and it's your job to use it to get the items where they need to go through all 5 levels.

Instructions:

This game was made for the MashUp Game Jam 2 over the course of 72 hours. This is my first ever game jam game and my first game in general.
